warning.minLength: The meta description should be at least 140 characters for optimal SEO visibility in search results
warning.maxLength: The meta description should not exceed 160 characters as it will be truncated in search results

featuredBlogs.title: Featured blogs
featuredBlogs.description: Select up to 3 blogs to feature on this page. These blogs will be displayed prominently on the page.

openInNewTab.title: Open in new tab
openInNewTab.description: If checked, the link will open in a new tab.

alt.title: Alternative text
alt.description: A short description of the image's content. If left blank, it defaults to the media library alt text or, if unavailable, the file name.

badge.title: Badge
badge.description: The smaller text that sits above the title/text to provide context

title.title: Title
title.description: The large text that is the primary focus of the block

subtitle.title: Subtitle
subtitle.description: Additional context below the main title

faq.name: FAQ Section
faq.linkDescription: Optional link for additional content or actions

text.title: Link text
text.description: The text to display for the link

description.title: Link Description
description.description: A brief description of where the link leads to

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.description: Select the FAQ items to display in this accordion

width.title: Media width
width.description: Sets the width of the displayed media

pricing.name: Pricing section
pricing.description: A brief description of the pricing options

planPrice.title: Plan price
planPrice.description: The price of the plan (e.g. '$29' or 'Free')

planBillingPeriod.title: Billing period
planBillingPeriod.description: The billing period (e.g. 'per month' or 'per year')

planDescription.title: Description
planDescription.description: A brief description of the plan

planFeatures.title: Features
planFeatures.description: List of features included in this plan

planIsPopular.title: Is popular
planIsPopular.description: Highlight this plan as the most popular option

navbar.title: Site Navigation
navbar.description: Configure the main navigation structure for your site
navbar.label: Navigation label
navbar.labelDescription: Internal label to identify this navigation configuration in the CMS

navigationStructure.title: Navigation Structure
navigationStructure.description: Build your navigation menu using columns and links. Add either a column of links or individual links.

link.title: Navigation link
link.description: Individual navigation link with name and URL
link.linkDescription: The description for this navigation link

linkText.title: Link text
linkText.description: The text that will be displayed for this navigation link

url.title: Link URL
url.description: The URL that this link will navigate to when clicked

navigationColumn.title: Navigation Column
navigationColumn.description: A column of navigation links with an optional title

column.title: Column Title
column.description: The heading text displayed above this group of navigation links

links.title: Column Links
links.description: The list of navigation links to display in this column

footer.title: Footer
footer.labelDescription: Label used to identify footer in the CMS
footer.subtitleDescription: Subtitle that sits beneath the logo in the footer

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Global settings and configuration for your website
settings.label: Label
settings.labelDescription: Label used to identify settings in the CMS
settings.siteTitleDescription: The main title of your website, used in browser tabs and SEO
settings.siteDescriptionDescription: A brief description of your website for SEO purposes
settings.contactEmailDescription: Primary contact email address for your website

socialMediaLinks.title: Social Media Links
socialMediaLinks.description: Add links to your social media profiles

linkedIn.title: LinkedIn URL
linkedIn.description: Full URL to your LinkedIn profile/company page

facebook.title: Facebook URL
facebook.description: Full URL to your Facebook profile/page

twitter.title: Twitter/X URL
twitter.description: Full URL to your Twitter/X profile

instagram.title: Instagram URL
instagram.description: Full URL to your Instagram profile
